Text: Excellent Quality at this file size. Will be looking for more PS3 releases. Though I only have a 24" HD monitor, the quality looks great on it. 10/10
for some reason, this movie doesn't want to transfer to my hdd. it says the file is too big, which is weird cause i thought this file would work with FAT32.
yeah you cant transfer this with fat32 fuckin bullshit. ps3 team didnt pull through with the clutch this time.
